contextTooLongErrorMessage.message: An error has occurred. The message submitted was too long, start a new chat and submit a shorter message.

example_1.message: “List birthday gift ideas for a 14-year-old boy.”

example_2.message: “Help me plan a 7-day trip to Tokyo.”

freshChat.message: If you have no more questions, we’ll erase this chat in 5 mins so you can start a fresh one.

genieDescription.message: Genie can detect if texts, emails, websites, or social media posts are a scam within seconds. Simply copy and paste or upload screenshots of suspicious messages to the app, and it lets you know immediately if it could be a scam.

inappropriateErrorMessage.message: I'm sorry, but I can't assist with this request.

initialScreenSubtitle.message: Get the answers you’re looking for with AI Chat.

inputTooLongErrorMessage.message: An error has occurred. The message submitted was too long, submit a shorter message.

limitError.message: You’ve reached the message limit for this session. Try clearing the chat to start over.

limitErrorMessage.message: You’ve reached the message limit for this session. Try clearing the chat to start over.

stillThere.message: Still there? You haven’t written anything in a while.

tooManyRequestsError.message: Too many requests. Try again later.

tryGenie.message: Norton Genie, our real time AI-powered scam detection tool.
